name: Mash Gadget
description:
Mash like a master!

Stretch that forearm, crack those knuckles -- it’s time to test your mashing skills in Mash Gadget, a digital (emphasis on the digit) throwback toy for Playdate, perfect for training those trigger fingers or just fidgeting away the minutes.

Includes a host of calculator-style games and practical uses:

  • MASH-A & MASH-B: How many button taps can you score in just a few seconds? The master challenge is 160 or more! (Bursting watermelon not included.)
  • SAFE: Use the Playdate crank to find three numbers that unlock the digital safe. (Priceless treasure not included.)
  • TIME & STOP: Clock and stopwatch modes make a fashionable app-cessory for your Playdate. (Reminder notifications not included.)
  • Plus a secret mode for frequent mashers
